Mountain.title: Mountain
Mountain.description: Represents a mountain with its associated information.

name_en.description: The English name of the mountain.

slug.description: A unique URL-friendly string representing the mountain's name.

description.description: General information and description about the mountain.

imageUrl.description: URL for a representative image of the mountain.

height.description: The height of the mountain in meters.

bestSeason.description: The best season to visit the mountain.

difficulty.description: The difficulty level of climbing the mountain.

InfoItem.title: InfoItem
InfoItem.description: Represents a specific piece of information related to a mountain, such as a restaurant or a hotel.

id.description: Unique identifier for the information item.

category.description: Category of the information item (e.g., restaurant, hotel).

name_en.description: English title of the information item.

description.description: Detailed description of the information item.

description_en.description: English description of the information item.

address.description: Address of the place, if applicable.

contact.description: Contact information (phone number, email, website), if applicable.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image associated with the information item.

Reservation.title: Reservation
Reservation.description: Represents a reservation made for a specific info item.

customerName.description: Name of the customer making the reservation.

customerEmail.description: Email address of the customer making the reservation.

reservationDate.description: The date and time for the reservation.

numberOfPeople.description: The number of people in the reservation.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile with personal and travel information.

emergencyContactName.description: Name of the emergency contact person.

emergencyContactPhone.description: Phone number of the emergency contact person.

family.description: Family status: 0=no kids, 1=one kid, 2=more than one.

region.description: The region where the user lives.

travel_interest.description: Rating of interest in domestic travel.
